title: Potato Bean Soup
ingredients: ['1.5 litres water', '1 (400g) tin kidney beans', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, chopped', '2 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '3 tablespoons chicken stock granules', '1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1/2 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 teaspoons curry powder', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '125ml full fat milk', '125ml single cream', '25g dry potato flakes', '4 tablespoons chopped spring onions']
